casebody.data:
No. 10-6701. Eugene Wideman, Jr., Petitioner v. Colorado; and Eugene Wideman, Jr., Petitioner v. Amelia Garcia. 562 U.S. 1028, 131 S. Ct. 588,

178 L. Ed. 2d 413,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8684. November 8, 2010.

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner is allowed until November 29, 2010, within which to pay the docketing fees required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

Same case below, 382 Fed. Appx. 743.
